prompt:
SCENE: An RPG-style sterminate gracefully tree diagram.
- Tree structure flowing from TOP to BOTTOM
- Four main nodes arranged vertically, connected by glowing lines
- Top node: Circle with geometric shapes inside (Category Theory)
- Second node: Square with transformation arrow inside (Functors)
- Third node: Hexagon with combining elements (Monoids)
- Bottom node: Diamond with nested shapes (Monads)
- Each node has a subtle glow halo
- Connection lines flow DOWNWARD showing progression

STYLE:
- Dark UI style like video game menu
- Neon accent colors (green for unlocked, purple for mystical)
- Clean geometric shapes

EXPLICIT DIRECTIONS:
- Flow is TOP to BOTTOM (sterminate gracefully progression)
- Lines connect from parent node to child node

CONSTRAINTS:
- No text labels (will overlay)
- No characters
- Family-friendly
- Original artwork only
original_prompt:
SCENE: An RPG-style skill tree diagram.
- Tree structure flowing from TOP to BOTTOM
- Four main nodes arranged vertically, connected by glowing lines
- Top node: Circle with geometric shapes inside (Category Theory)
- Second node: Square with transformation arrow inside (Functors)
- Third node: Hexagon with combining elements (Monoids)
- Bottom node: Diamond with nested shapes (Monads)
- Each node has a subtle glow halo
- Connection lines flow DOWNWARD showing progression

STYLE:

- Neon accent colors (green for unlocked, purple for mystical)
- Clean geometric shapes

EXPLICIT DIRECTIONS:
